item.text: The Lord said to Aaron, “You and your sons and your tribe with you must bear the iniquity of the sanctuary, and you and your sons with you must bear the iniquity of your priesthood.
“Bring with you your brothers, the tribe of Levi, the tribe of your father, so that they may join with you and minister to you while you and your sons with you are before the tent of the testimony.

They must <st data-num="08104" class="">be responsible</st> to <st data-num="04931" class="">care</st> for you and to <st data-num="04931" class="">care</st> for the <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="0168" class="">tabernacle</st>. <st data-num="0389" class="">However</st>, they must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07126" class="">come near</st> the <st data-num="03627" class="">furnishings</st> of the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> and the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">both</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.

They must <st data-num="03867" class="">join</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> you, and they will <st data-num="08104" class="">be responsible for</st> the <st data-num="04931" class="">care</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>, for <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>, but <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="02114" class="">unauthorized person</st><n id="2" /> may <st data-num="07126" class="">approach</st> you.

You will <st data-num="08104" class="">be responsible for</st> the <st data-num="04931" class="">care</st> of the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> and the <st data-num="04931" class="">care</st> of the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>, so that there will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">more</st> <st data-num="07110" class="">wrath</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>.
I myself have chosen your brothers the Levites from among the Israelites. They are given to you as a gift from the Lord, to perform the duties of the tent of meeting.

But you and your sons with you are responsible for your priestly duties, for everything at the altar and within the curtain. And you must serve. I give you the priesthood as a gift for service, but the unauthorized person who approaches must be put to death.”

The Lord spoke to Aaron, “See, I have given you the responsibility for my raised offerings; I have given all the holy things of the Israelites to you as your priestly portion and to your sons as a perpetual ordinance.

Of all the <st data-num="06944" class="">most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy offerings</st> reserved<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> yours: <st data-num="03605" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> of theirs, whether from <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st> or from <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st> or from <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="0817" class="">reparation offering</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> they <st data-num="07725" class="">bring</st> to me, will be <st data-num="06944" class="">most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> for you and for your <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>.
You are to eat it as a most holy offering; every male may eat it. It will be holy to you.

“And this is yours: the raised offering of their gift, along with all the wave offerings of the Israelites. I have given them to you and to your sons and daughters with you as a perpetual ordinance. Everyone who is ceremonially clean in your household may eat of it.
“All the best of the olive oil and all the best of the wine and of the wheat, the firstfruits of these things that they give to the Lord, I have given to you.
And whatever first ripe fruit in their land they bring to the Lord will be yours; everyone who is ceremonially clean in your household may eat of it.
“Everything devoted in Israel will be yours.

The firstborn of every womb which they present to the Lord, whether human or animal, will be yours. Nevertheless, the firstborn sons you must redeem, and the firstborn males of unclean animals you must redeem.

And those that must be <st data-num="06299" class="">redeemed</st> you are to <st data-num="06299" class="">redeem</st> when they are a <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st>, according to your <st data-num="06187" class="">estimation</st>, for <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st> of <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st> (<st data-num="01931" class="">which</st> is <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="01626" class="">gerahs)</st>.

But you must not redeem the firstborn of a cow or a sheep or a goat; they are holy. You must splash their blood on the altar and burn their fat for an offering made by fire for a pleasing aroma to the Lord.

And their <st data-num="01320" class="">meat</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> yours, just as the <st data-num="02373" class="">breast</st> and the <st data-num="03225" class="">right</st> <st data-num="07785" class="">hip</st> of the <st data-num="08573" class="">raised offering</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> yours.

All the raised offerings of the holy things that the Israelites offer to the Lord, I have given to you, and to your sons and daughters with you, as a perpetual ordinance. It is a covenant of salt forever before the Lord for you and for your descendants with you.”
The Lord spoke to Aaron, “You will have no inheritance in their land, nor will you have any portion of property among them—I am your portion and your inheritance among the Israelites.

<st data-num="02009" class="">See</st>, I have <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> the <st data-num="01121 03878">Levites</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04643" class="">tithes</st> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> for an <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st>, <st data-num="02500" class="">for</st> their <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="05647" class="">perform</st>—the <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>.

<st data-num="03808" class="">No</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">longer</st> may the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="07126" class="">approach</st> the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>, or else they will <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> their <st data-num="02399" class="">sin</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.

But the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> must <st data-num="05647" class="">perform</st> the <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>, and <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> must <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> their <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st>.<n id="2" /> It will be a <st data-num="05769" class="">perpetual</st> <st data-num="02708" class="">ordinance</st> throughout your <st data-num="01755" class="">generations</st> that <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> the Levites<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05157" class="">have</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st>.<n id="4" />

But I have given to the Levites for an inheritance the tithes of the Israelites that are offered to the Lord as a raised offering. That is why I said to them that among the Israelites they are to have no inheritance.”
The Lord spoke to Moses:

“You are to speak to the Levites, and you must tell them, ‘When you receive from the Israelites the tithe that I have given you from them as your inheritance, then you are to offer up from it as a raised offering to the Lord a tenth of the tithe.

And your <st data-num="08641" class="">raised offering</st> will be <st data-num="02803" class="">credited</st><n id="1" /> to you as though it were <st data-num="01715" class="">grain</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="01637" class="">threshing floor</st> or as <st data-num="04395" class="">new wine</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="03342" class="">winepress</st>.
Thus you are to offer up a raised offering to the Lord of all your tithes that you receive from the Israelites; and you must give the Lord’s raised offering from it to Aaron the priest.
From all your gifts you must offer up every raised offering due the Lord, from all the best of it, and the holiest part of it.’
“Therefore you will say to them, ‘When you offer up the best of it, then it will be credited to the Levites as the product of the threshing floor and as the product of the winepress.

And you may<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> it in <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>, <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> and your <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is your <st data-num="07939" class="">wages</st> <st data-num="02500" class="">for</st> your <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> in the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>.
And you will bear no sin concerning it when you offer up the best of it. And you must not profane the holy things of the Israelites, or else you will die.’”
